transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji Roshan bhai?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji Roshan bhai?
Customer: Aap kaun si company se baat kar rahe ho sir?
Executive: Sir, main SM Creation se bol raha hu.
Customer: Achha ha ha ha sir ha ha ha.
Executive: Ye customer care wala number hai na?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Ye customer care wala number hai na?
Executive: Baat to ho gayi, baat to ho gayi na sir humari. Main dobara call aa raha tha isliye maine call back kiya.
Customer: Achha achha wo by mistake gayi hogi. Ek bari ko sir 3:00-3:30 baje na main aapko connect karta hu.
Kyuki hume aur bhi bahut sari discuss karni hai, humari call miss ho rahi hai bahut sari.
Hai na?
Customer: Haan yaar wo asal mein bas thodi si samasya chal rahi hai sab focus karna hai mujhe in cheezon pe.
Executive: Haan 50-60% humara call response rate hai, ye kaafi kam hai. Humara catalog quality score thoda kam hai.
Right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To do-char cheeze hume discuss karni hai to aap batao kab discuss kar sakte ho? Kya aapki tabiyat kharab hai to main zyada aapko disturb nahi karna chahta.
Customer: Nahi Roshan bhai main aapko 4:00 baje aas pass karta hu. 10 minute mein, 10 minute mein sir no problem. Okay okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss catalog quality score.

- Wants to discuss call response rate.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 3:00-3:30 PM.

- Customer will call back around 4:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog quality, call response, follow up
